body:
Just uploaded the next episode last night. Hope you guys enjoy! 
Lots more of these episodes to come, but especially this week! This week I plan to get a few more of these uploaded, and although I'll post on these forums when I do, keep watching my channel to see any other types of vids you're interested in.
Here's a link to my channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/BlackjackMinecraft/videos

Watch the first episode also, if you haven't already seen it…
:D

BTW! Say OP-ness (Overpowered-ness) out loud!

#theopnesschallenge
